projects.title: Rapback
projects.desc: A social network for making rap videos with your friends. Android and iOS.

bio.desc: I am a software engineer at Yahoo helping create their new line of mobile search products. Specifically, I help build application servers, and primarily write code in Scala, Java, and Javascript. Before Yahoo, I interned at AddThis (later acquired by Oracle) and graduated UVA in 2015 (BS CS). My email is bp5xj @ virginia.edu.
